content: callisto hat tommy knits a free pattern from kelbourne woolens for the year of dk hats callisto hat ttoommmmyy kknniittss specifications stitch patterns yarn k1 p1 ribbing in the round over a brim unfolded round 18 c2/2r c2/2l p1 c2/2l c2/2r p1 skills repeat rnds 1 18 for patt tubular cast on working from charts cables worthy of note callisto is worked in the round from the bottom up after a tubular cast on a k1 p1 ribbing is worked to form the deep brim an x o cable pattern is worked for the body of the hat from written or charted instructions decreases are worked from charted or written instructions the beginning of the round is shifted on the first round of the decrease section abbrevations c2/2l sl 2 sts to cn hold front k2 k2 from cn c2/2r sl 2 sts to cn hold back k2 k2
